query:
ALTER TABLE cms_pages 
ADD COLUMN meta_title VARCHAR(120) DEFAULT NULL,
ADD COLUMN meta_description VARCHAR(320) DEFAULT NULL,
ADD COLUMN og_image VARCHAR(500) DEFAULT NULL,
ADD COLUMN canonical_url VARCHAR(500) DEFAULT NULL,
ADD COLUMN schema_type ENUM('Article', 'Course', 'Organization', 'WebPage', 'FAQPage', 'Service') DEFAULT 'WebPage',
ADD COLUMN og_title VARCHAR(120) DEFAULT NULL,
ADD COLUMN og_description VARCHAR(320) DEFAULT NULL,
ADD COLUMN twitter_card ENUM('summary', 'summary_large_image') DEFAULT 'summary_large_image',
ADD COLUMN no_index BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN structured_data JSON DEFAULT NULL;

ADD COLUMN og_image VARCHAR(500) DEFAULT NULL,

ADD COLUMN twitter_card ENUM('summary', 'summary_large_image') DEFAULT 'summary_large_image',
